EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Global_HCE_Datalink-Plan_Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: New Low-Cost Datalink Plan Takes 5 Minutes to Setup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Low Cost. Low Maintenance. Ask for Lite Link from Honeywell Forge. Interested in datalink services for your aircraft, but don’t want the more expensive monthly fee? It’s time to give the new low-cost regional datalink plan from Honeywell a look.
This new service package is designed for business and general aviation operators who fly shorter routes and provides real-time datalink communications for the cockpit. It also reduces pre-flight pilot workload by uploading flight plans directly into the aircraft’s flight management system.
Click the link <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/lite-link?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=litelink]]> to learn more and get signed up today. It takes less than 5 minutes to get enrolled. GET STARTED <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/lite-link?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_honeywellforge_bga&utm_content=litelink]]> *Attention: Current Honeywell Forge Datalink customers are not eligible for the Lite Link offering.
